Country: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

City: Kuala Lumpur (official, legislative and royal) Putrajaya (administrative and judicial)
Podgorica (official) Cetinje (Old Royal Capital, present seat of thePresident)
Sana'a (de jure) Aden (de facto, seat of government)
Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte (official) Colombo (former capital; has some government offices)
Yamoussoukro (official) Abidjan (former capital; still has many government offices)
